channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping attracting rodents in an area with children, 1st December
item.description:
Constant fly tipping area. Now some mattress and furniture. After reporting, it takes ages to be clear attracting more fly tipping and rodents, having children in the area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bunton Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent Request for Cleaning and Maintenance – Woodsford Building Lifts and Corridors, 1st December
item.description:
Urgent Request for Cleaning and Maintenance – Woodsford Building Lifts and Corridors Dear Southwark Council Housing Management, I would like to report ongoing issues in our building (Woodsford Portland Street London)Both lifts are in very poor condition and have not been cleaned properly for months. The entrance corridors are also not being maintained. Additionally, dogs have been urinating in the lifts, causing a very strong and unpleasant smell, making them difficult to use. Could you please arrange for the lifts and the entrance corridors to be cleaned as soon as possible? Also, could you place a notice reminding pet owners that dogs are not allowed to urinate inside the lifts? Thank you for your attention and prompt action.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portland Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 85 Chesterfield Grove (along wall) 2nd Complaint, 1st December
item.description:
Second complaint of heavy wooden crate still not taken up in over 2 weeks. Now a cardboard box has been added. As the wind is strong, the items will cause a health and safety hazard for pedestrians, items could be blown in their pathway and/or the crate falling on them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
